abstract: Axa Equitable, the insurance giant owned by Axa, has introduced an online game devoted to demonstrating the need to buy life insurance.
snippet: Axa Equitable, the insurance giant owned by Axa, has introduced an online game devoted to demonstrating the need to buy life insurance.
lead_paragraph: 3:55 p.m. | Updated Playing games online, known as online gaming or casual gaming, is becoming increasingly popular with marketers because it is becoming increasingly popular with consumers. Even companies in categories that have not been taking part in the trend are starting to, well, play.

headline.main: Axa Equitable Pitches in an Online Game
